verses.roman:
prabhura nāme mātāre daṇḍavat kailā
prabhura vinati-stuti mātāre kahilā

synonyms: prabhura nāme—in the name of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; mātāre—to His mother; daṇḍavat kailā—he offered obeisances; prabhura—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; vinati-stuti—very submissive prayers; mātāre—to His mother; kahilā—he informed.
translation: He offered obeisances to Śacīmātā in the name of Lord Caitanya Mahāprabhu and informed her of all the Lord's submissive prayers to her.
